results.title: Clarinet and bass clarinet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the clarinet and bass clarinet are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them.

results.title: Oboe and coranglais
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the oboe and the coranglais are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them. Musicians: Rosemary Stimson, Jiri Tancibudek.

results.title: Basic Metalwork
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

group_works.title: Beaten metalwork, seaming: making a child's mug
Between the hammer and the anvil
Metal cutting tools: rake and clearance angles

results.title: Metal cutting tools: rake and clearance angles
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic Metalwork”.
A demonstration of the correct usage of cutting tools. Angles required for clearance to avoid rubbing, chatter and vibration are shown in detail. Rake angles used for drilling different types of metals are also demonstrated.
results.title_for_label: Metal cutting tools: rake and clearance angles
results.description:
